docs.snippet: Defending police officers who have come under scrutiny like never before, President Barack Obama on Tuesday said the men and women who risk their lives to provide security are wrongly "scapegoated" for failing to deal with broader problems that le...
docs.lead_paragraph: Defending police officers who have come under scrutiny like never before, President Barack Obama on Tuesday said the men and women who risk their lives to provide security are wrongly "scapegoated" for failing to deal with broader problems that lead people to commit crimes.

headline.main: Obama to Police Chiefs: US Safer Because of Your Efforts
headline.print_headline: Obama to Police Chiefs: US Safer Because of Your Efforts

docs.snippet: This year has brought an unusually grim and steady drumbeat of violence throughout the country....

docs.snippet: Chelsea Ake-Salvacion felt she was on health care’s cutting edge, working at a cryotherapy center. Last week, she was found dead in one of its tanks....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chelsea Ake-Salvacion felt she was on health care’s cutting edge, working at a cryotherapy center. Last week, she was found dead in one of its tanks.
docs.abstract: Chelsea Ake-Salvacion is found dead in freezing tank at Rejuvenice spa in Las Vegas, where she worked, and Nevada health and safety officials are called to scene; her death raises questions about safety in growing industry of cryotherapy, which is meant to help people burn calories, reduce pain, strengthen immune systems and halt aging.

headline.main: Death of Woman in Tank at a Nevada Cryotherapy Center Raises Questions About Safety
headline.print_headline: Death of Woman in Tank at a Nevada Cryotherapy Center Raises Questions About Safety

byline.contributor: Kimberley McGee reported from Henderson, and Julie Turkewitz from Denver.
byline.original: By KIMBERLEY McGEE and JULIE TURKEWITZ
